text: aho davud! api oba mahapolove niyojitayaku bavata pat kalemu. eheyin oba janaya atara yuktigaruka va tindu denu. tavada asavan anugamanaya nokaranu. evita eya allahge margayen oba nomaga yavanu æta. niyata vasayenma allahge margayen nomaga giyavun vana ovunata viniscaya dinaya ovun amataka kala bævin dædi danduvamak æta
